attributes.action: abolish compulsary Physical Education in secondry schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is because students are worrying about physical education and not focusing on thier GCSE's. They also don't get enough time to study. The PE lessons they don't do could be used for study.

We want it abolished by 2011.

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists. You may wish to add your name to this petition: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/banpeinschools/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
